section.title: Making Scale Configuration Changes
section.para: This procedure describes how to make the recommended configuration changes to achieve 8,000 virtual machine instances.

note.para: In a scale environment for ESX computes, the configuration of vCenter Proxy VM has to be increased to 8 vCPUs and 16 GB RAM. By default it is 4 vCPUs and 4 GB RAM.
